title: Cheese and Caramelized Onion Sandwiches with Apple Salad
instructions: Before starting, preheat broiler to high and wash and dry all produce.
Core, then cut apple into small pieces. Cut cheddar cheese in slices. Halve buns.

Peel, then cut the onion into 1/2-Inch slices. Heat a large non-stick pan over medium heat. When hot, add 1 tbsp oil, then onions. Cook until slightly softened, 3-4 min. Season with salt. Cook, stirring occasionally, until the onions are dark golden-brown, 4-6 min. Carefully rinse and wipe pan clean.
Arrange bun halves, cut side up. Spread apple jam and top with cheese onto top buns. Bake in the middle of the oven, until cheese melts, 3-5 min.
Add lettuce and apple pieces to a bowl. Toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper.
Top cheese with top buns and cut sandwiches in half. Divide sandwiches and salad between plates.
